juzs.text: 25|21|Kasone, ki ʙa didori Mo [dar oxirat] umed nadorand, guftand: «Caro faristagone ʙar mo nozil nasudaand, jo [caro] Parvardigoramonro nameʙinem»? Be tardid, onon dar ʙorai xud takaʙʙur varzidand va sarkasii ʙuzurg kardand
25|22|Ruze, ki [kofiron] faristagonro meʙinand, hec ʙasorate ʙaroi mucrimon naxohad ʙud, [ʙalki ruzi kajfaru azoʙ ast] va [faristagon] megujand: «[Bihist] Bar sumo mamnu' [va harom] ast»
25|23|Va ʙa [ʙarrasii] korhojason mepardozem va hamaro [hamcun] ƣuʙore parokanda mesozem
25|24|Dar on ruz ʙihistijon ʙehtarin cojgohu nakutarin istirohatgohro dorand
25|25|Va [jod kun az] ruze, ki osmon ʙo aʙrhoi saped sikofta mesavad va faristagon [pajopaj ʙa sarzamini mahsar] furu firistoda mesavand
25|26|Dar on ruz farmonravoi [-i rostin] az oni [Allohi] Rahmon ast va ʙaroi kofiron ruze dusvor ast
25|27|Va [jod kun az] ruze, ki sitamgor dastonasro [az hasrat] megazad va megujad: «Ej kos, man rohe [hamohang] ʙo pajomʙar ʙarguzida ʙudam
25|28|Ej voj ʙar man! Ej kos, falon [kofir]-ro ʙa dusti namegiriftam
25|29|Be tardid, pas az on ki Qur'on [va da'vati pajomʙar] ʙa man rasid, u [ʙud, ki] maro ʙa gumrohi kasond va sajton hamvora insonro tanho [va xor] vomeguzorad»
25|30|Va Pajomʙar guft: «Parvardigoro, qavmi man in Qur'onro raho kardaand»
25|31|Va incunin ʙaroi har pajomʙare dusmane az ʙadkoroni [qavmas] qaror dodem. Va kofi ast, ki Parvardigorat rohnamo va jovarat ʙosad

25|32|Va kasone, ki kufr varzidand, guftand: «Caro Qur'on jakʙora ʙar u nozil nasudaast?» Mo in guna [kalomi ilohiro ʙa murur nozil] kardaem, to dilatro ʙo on [orom va] ustuvor gardonem va onro ʙa tadric ʙar tu xondaem [to darku hifzas oson ʙosad]
25|33|Va [kofiron] hec [e'tirozu] masale ʙarojat nameovarand, magar on ki Mo [niz posuxe] ʙar haq va xusʙajontar ʙarojat meovarem
25|34|Kasone, ki ʙa ruj daraftoda ʙa duzax kasonda mesavand, inon ʙadcojgohtar va gumrohtarand
25|35|Va dar haqiqat, Mo ʙa Muso kitoʙ [Tavrot] dodem va ʙarodaras Horunro dastjoras soxtem
25|36|Va guftem: «Sumo du nafar ʙa sui qavme ʙiraved, ki ojoti Moro duruƣ angostand». Pas, [cun fir'avnijon sarpeci namudand] ʙa siddat noʙudason soxtem
25|37|Va qavmi Nuhro – on goh ki pajomʙaronro duruƣgu angostand – ƣarq kardem va ononro ʙaroi mardum [nisona va] iʙrate qaror dodem; va ʙaroi sitamgoron azoʙe dardnok muhajjo kardaem
25|38|Va [hamcunin] qavmi Od va Samud va aholii "coh" va naslhoi ʙisjorero, ki ʙajni onon ʙudand [noʙud soxtem]
25|39|Va ʙaroi har jak az onho masalho zadem va [cun pand nagiriftand] hamaro ʙa siddat az mijon ʙurdem

25|40|Va [musrikon] hatman, az [sarzamini qavmi Lut hamon] sahre, ki ʙoroni ʙalo ʙar on ʙorida ʙud, guzar kardaand. Ojo on [vajronahoi ʙoqimonda az azoʙ] -ro nadidaand? [Cunin nest] Balki ʙa zinda sudan [pas az marg] umede nadorand
25|41|Va hangome ki turo meʙinand, faqta ʙa tamasxur megirand [va megujand] «Ojo in hamon kasest, ki Alloh taolo ʙa pajomʙari firistodaast

25|42|Agar ʙar [parastisi] ma'ʙudonamon [sikeʙoi va] pojdori namekardem, nazdik ʙud [Muhammad] az [rohi] onho gumrohamon kunad». Vale on goh ki azoʙ [-i ilohi]-ro ʙuʙinand, xohand donist ci kase gumrohtar [ʙuda] ast
25|43|Ojo kase, ki havoi nafsasro ma'ʙudi xud kardaast, didai? Ojo tu [metavoni] nigahʙoni [imoni] u ʙosi
25|44|Ojo gumon dori, ki ʙestarason mesunavand jo mefahmand? Onon cuz hammonandi cahorpojon nestand, ʙalki gumrohtarand

25|45|Ojo [ofarinisi] Parvardigoratro nadidai, ki ci guna sojaro gustaronidaast va agar mexost, onro soʙit menamud? On goh [taƣjiri cojgohi] xursed [nisʙat ʙa zamin]-ro daleli [gustarisu harakati] on [soja] qaror dodem
25|46|Sipas [ʙo taƣjiri ʙalandii xursed sojaro kutoh mekunem va] onro andak-andak ʙa suji xes ʙozmegirem
25|47|Va Ust, ki saʙro [ʙo torikii farogiras] pusise ʙaroi sumo qaror dod va xoʙro mojai osois va ruzro hangomi ʙarxostan [va koru talos] soxt
25|48|Va Ust, ki pes az [ʙoroni] rahmatas ʙodhoro ʙasoratʙaxs firistod va az osmon oʙe pok [va pokkunanda] furu firistodem
25|49|To ʙo on sarzamini [xusku] murdaro zinda gardonem va cahorpojon va insonhoi ʙisjorero, ki ofaridaem, seroʙ sozem
25|50|Va ʙa rosti, on [daloilu nisonahoi qudrati ilohi]-ro ʙa surathoi gunogun ʙajon kardem, to pand girand, vale ʙestar mardum cuz [inkoru] nosiposi nakardand
25|51|Va agar mexostem, dar har dijore ʙimdihandae ʙarmeangextem
25|52|Pas, [ej pajomʙar] az kofiron itoat nakun va ʙa vasilai Qur'on ʙo onon ʙa cihodi ʙuzurge ʙarxez [va dar in roh sikeʙo ʙos]
25|53|Va Ust, ki du darjoro ʙa ham omext: in jake xusguvor va sirin ast va on jake suru talx va dar mijoni on du moneai nufuznopazire qaror dod [to ʙo ham najomezand]
25|54|Va Ust, ki insonro az oʙi [mani] ofarid va uro doroi pajvandi nasaʙi va saʙaʙi gardonid va Parvardigorat hamvora tavonost
25|55|Va [musrikon] ʙa coji Alloh taolo cizero meparastand, ki na ʙa onon sude meʙaxsad va na zijone merasonad va kofir dar ʙaroʙari Parvardigoras pajvasta pustiʙon [-i sajton] ast
25|56|Va [ej pajomʙar] Mo turo cuz ʙasoratʙaxs va ʙimdihanda nafiristodem
25|57|Bigu: «Man [dar ʙaroʙari risolatam] hec podose az sumo namexoham, magar kase, ki ʙixohad rohe ʙa sui Parvardigoras ʙarguzinad [va hamin ʙarojam kofi ast]»
25|58|Va ʙar [Parvardigori] zindae, ki hargiz namemirad, tavakkal kun va ʙo citois Uro ʙa poki jod kun. Va hamin ʙas, ki U ʙa gunohoni ʙandagonas ogoh ast

25|59|[Hamon] Kase, ki osmonho va zamin va on ciro mijoni onhost dar sas ruz ofarid, sipas ʙar Ars qaror girift. [U Allohi] Rahmon ast, pas, dar mavridi U az on ki ogoh ast, ʙipurs [va U niz kase cuz Alloh taolo nest]

25|60|Va hangome ki ʙa ʙa onon gufta savad: «Baroi [Allohi] Rahmon sacda kuned», megujand: «Rahmon kist? Ojo [qaror ast] ʙar har ci tu amr mekuni sacda ʙarem»? Va [in da'vati tu duri az haq va] nafratasonro meafzojad
25|61|Purʙarakat [va ʙuzurgvor] ast, on ki dar osmon manzilgohhoe [ʙaroi sitoragon] qaror dod va dar [mijoni] onho xursed [-i duraxson] va mohi toʙone padid ovard
25|62|Va Ust, ki saʙu ruzro dar paji jakdigar qaror dod, ʙaroi har ki ʙixohad [az tadʙiri ilohi] pand girad jo siposguzor ʙosad

25|63|Va ʙandagoni [mu'minu soistai] Rahmon kasone hastand, ki ʙo furutani [va matonat] ʙar zamin roh meravand va hangome ki cohilon [ʙo suxanoni nopisand] xitoʙason mekunand, [ʙa coi talofi ʙo onon] ʙa neki suxan megujand
25|64|Va kasone ʙaroi Parvardigorason dar holi sacda va qijom saʙzindadori mekunand
25|65|Va kasone, ki megujand: «Parvardigoro, azoʙi duzaxro az mo ʙozgardon, [ki] ʙe tardid, azoʙas [saxtu] pojdor ast
25|66|Haqqo, ki duzax ʙad cojgoh va iqomatgohest
25|67|Va [mu'minon] kasone hastand, ki cun infoq menamojand, na zijodaravi mekunand va na saxtgiri va ʙajni in du [holat rohi] e'tidol pes megirand

25|68|Va kasone hastand, ki ʙo Alloh taolo ma'ʙude digar namexonand va kase, ki Alloh taolo [kustanasro] harom kardaast, cuz ʙa haq namekusand va zino namekunand. Va har ki in [gunohon]-ro murtakiʙ savad, kajfari gunohi [xes]-ro meʙinad
25|69|Ruzi qijomat azoʙas ducandon megardad va ʙo xori dar on [azoʙ] covidon memonad
25|70|Magar kase, ki tavʙa kunad va imon ovarad va kore soista ancom dihad. Pas, inonand, ki Alloh taolo ʙadihojasonro ʙa nekiho taʙdil mekunad va Alloh taolo hamvora omurzgoru mehruʙon ast
25|71|Va kase, ki tavʙa kunad va kore soista ancom dihad, pas, jaqinan ʙa dargohi Alloh taolo – cunon ki ʙojadu sojad – tavʙa kardaast

25|72|Va kasone [mu'minand], ki guvohii duruƣ namedihand [va dar macolisi ʙotil huzur namejoʙand] va cun ʙa [kori nopisand jo] ʙehudae ʙarxurd mekunand, ʙuzurgvorona [az kanoras] meguzarand [va xudro oluda namesozand]
25|73|Va kasone, ki cun ʙa ojoti Parvardigorason pand doda mesavand, [az on ƣaflat namekunand va dar ʙaroʙari Qur'on] cun karonu kuron nestand
25|74|Va kasone, ki megujand: «Parvardigoro, az hamsaronu farzandonamon [kasonero] ʙa mo ato farmo, ki [mojai sodii dilho va] ravsanii casmho ʙosand va moro pesvoi parhezkoron qaror ʙideh»
25|75|[Ore] Inon ʙa posi on ki sikeʙoi kardaand, manozil [-i olii ʙihist]-ro podos megirand va dar on co ʙo durudu salomi [faristagon] ru ʙa ru megardand
25|76|Dar on co covidonand. Ci naku cojgoh va [ci nek] iqomatgohe ast

25|77|[Ba kofiron] ʙigu: «Agar iʙodat va duojaton naʙosad, Parvardigoram e'tinoe ʙa sumo nadorad [va arzise ʙarojaton qoil nest]. Ba rosti, sumo [da'vati haqro] duruƣ angosted, pas, ʙa zudi [kajfari in kor] gireʙongiraton xohad sud
26|1|To, sin, mim
26|2|In ojoti kitoʙi ravsangar ast
26|3|Sojad mexohi az [anduhi] in ki [musrikon] imon nameovarand, xudro halok kuni
26|4|Agar ʙixohem, az osmon nisonae ʙar onon nozil mekunem, ki dar ʙaroʙaras ʙo furutani sar furud ovarand
26|5|Va hec pandi tozae az sui [Allohi] Rahmon ʙaroi onon nameojad, magar in ki az on ruj gardonand
26|6|Ba rosti, onon [da'vati pajomʙaron va azoʙi qijomatro] duruƣ angostand, pas, ʙa zudi axʙori on ci masxara mekardand, ʙa eson xohad rasid
26|7|Ojo ʙa zamin namenigarand, ki ci ʙisjor az har guna [gijohi] sudmande dar on rujonidaem
26|8|Be tardid, dar in [ofarinis] nisonae [az qudrati Alloh taolo ʙar meod] ast, vale ʙestarason imon nameovarand
26|9|Va ʙe tardid, Parvardigorat sikastnopaziri mehruʙon ast
26|10|Va [jod kun az] hangome ki Parvardigorat Musoro nido dod, ki: «Ba suji qavmi sitamgor ʙirav
26|11|– qavmi Fir'avn - [va ʙa onon ʙigu] ojo [az kufru sarkasi] nameparhezand?»
26|12|[Muso] Guft: «Parvardigoro, ʙim doram, ki maro duruƣgu angorand
26|13|Va [az kufrason nosikeʙo va] ƣamgin gardam. Pas, [Caʙrailro] ʙa suji Horun ʙifrist [to ʙaroi joriam rahsiporas kunad]
26|14|Va onon [ʙa gumoni xes qasosi] gunohe ʙar man dorand, pas, metarsam, ki maro ʙikusand»
26|15|[Alloh taolo] Farmud: «Hargiz! Pas ʙo ojot [va mu'cizot]-i Mo ʙiraved. Jaqinan, [hama co] ʙo sumoem va [guftugujatonro] mesunavem
26|16|Pas, nazdi Fir'avn ʙiraved va ʙigued: «Mo firistodai Parvardigori cahonijon hastem
26|17|[U mefarmojad] Ki Bani Isroilro hamrohi mo ʙifirist»
26|18|[Fir'avn] guft: «Ojo turo dar kudaki mijoni xes parvaris nadodem va solhoe az umratro ʙajni mo naʙudi
26|19|Va kori xudro – cunon ki xosti – kardi [va on mardi qiʙtiro kusti] va tu [nisʙat ʙa ne'mathoi man] nosiposi?!»
26|20|[Muso] guft: «Man on [kor]-ro zamone ancom dodam, ki gumroh ʙudam
26|21|Pas, cun az sumo tarsidam, firor kardam. On goh Parvardigoram ʙa man donis ʙaxsid va maro az pajomʙaron qaror dod
26|22|Va in [ci] ne'matest, ki tu ʙar man minnat meguzori, ki Bani Isroilro ʙardai xud soxtai?!»
26|23|Fir'avn guft: «Parvardigori cahonijon kist?»
26|24|[Muso] Guft: «Parvardigori osmonho va zamin va on ci mijoni onhost. Agar ahli jaqin hasted [tanho uro ʙiparasted]»
26|25|[Fir'avn] Ba kasone, ki dar atrofas ʙudand [ʙo tamasxur] guft: «Ojo mesunaved [ci megujad]?»
26|26|[Muso] Guft: «[Alloh taolo] Parvardigori sumo va Parvardigori nijogoni sumost
26|27|[Fir'avn] Guft: «In pajomʙaraton, ki ʙa suji sumo firistoda sudaast, jaqinan devona ast»
26|28|[Muso] Guft: «Agar ʙiandesed, [xohed donist, ki U] Parvardigori masriq va maƣriʙ ast va har on ci mijoni on du qaror dorad»
26|29|[Fir'avn] Guft: «Agar ma'ʙude cuz man ʙarguzini, hatman, zindonat mekunam»
26|30|[Muso] Guft: «Hatto agar nisonai oskore [dar mavridi risolatam] ʙarojat ovarda ʙosam?»
26|31|[Fir'avn] Guft: «Agar rost megui, onro ʙijovar»
26|32|Pas, [Muso] asoi xudro andoxt, nogahon [taʙdil ʙa] aƶdahoe oskor sud
26|33|Va dastasro [az gireʙon] ʙerun ovard va nogoh dar nazari ʙinandagon saped [-u ravsan] ʙud
26|34|[Fir'avn] ʙa ʙuzurgoni peromunas guft: «Haqqo, ki in [mard] codugari donost
26|35|[U] Mexohad, ʙo codujas sumoro az sarzaminaton ʙerun kunad, pas, nazaraton cist?»
26|36|Onon guftand: «[Tasmim dar ʙorai mucozoti] u va ʙarodarasro ʙa ta'xir andoz va ma'muroni cam'ovari [corzanandagon]-ro ʙa [hamai] sahrho ʙifirist
26|37|to har codugari mohir [va] donoero nazdat ʙijovarand»
26|38|Pas, [cunin kardand va sarancom] codugaron ʙaroi va'dagohi ruzi muajjan gird ovarda sudand
26|39|Va ʙa mardum gufta sud: «Ojo sumo [niz] cam' mesaved, to [ʙuʙinem ʙaranda kist]
26|40|Agar codugaron piruz sudand, [hamagi] az onon pajravi kunem»
26|41|Pas, vaqte codugaron omadand, ʙa Fir'avn guftand: «Agar mo piruz savem, ojo podose xohem dost»
26|42|U guft: «Ore, dar on surat, hatman, az nazdikonam xohed ʙud»
26|43|Muso ʙa onon guft: «Har ci [mexohed] ʙiafkaned, [aknun] ʙiafkaned»
26|44|Pas, onon resmonho va asohojasonro afkandand va guftand: «Ba izzati Fir'avn savgand, ki mo, hatman, piruzem»
26|45|Sipas Muso asojasro afkand, nogahon [taʙdil ʙa aƶdahoe sud va] on ciro, ki ʙa duruƣ soxta ʙudand, ʙal'id [furu ʙurd]
26|46|Pas, codugaron ʙa sacda daraftodand
26|47|[Va] Guftand: «Mo ʙa Parvardigori cahonijon imon ovardem
26|48|Parvardigori Muso va Horun»

26|49|[Fir'avn] Guft: «Ojo pes az on ki ʙa sumo icozat diham, ʙa u imon ovarded? Be tardid, u hamon ʙuzurgi sumost, ki ʙa sumo codu omuxtaast. Pas, ʙa zudi xohed donist [ki mucozotaton cist]. Jaqinan, dastho va pojhojatonro ʙar'aks [-i jakdigar az capu rost] qat' mekunam va hamagiatonro ʙa dor meovezam»
26|50|Onon guftand: «[Dar in sikanca va azoʙ] Hec zijone nest. Be tardid, mo ʙa suji Parvardigoramon ʙozmegardem
26|51|Umed dorem, ki Parvardigoramon gunohoni moro ʙuʙaxsad, ki mo naxustin kasone hastem, ki [az in qavm ʙa Parvardigori Muso] imon ovardem»
26|52|Va ʙa Muso vahj kardem, ki: «Bandagonamro saʙona [az Misr] ʙerun ʙiʙar; [zero sipohi Fir'avn] hatman, ʙa dunʙolaton xohad omad»
26|53|Pas Fir'avn [cun az mocaro ogoh gardid] ma'muroni cam'ovari [neru]-ro ʙa sahrho firistod
26|54|[Va e'lon kard] Inho [Bani Isroil] iddai nocizand
26|55|Va ciddan moro ʙa xasm ovardaand
26|56|Va mo hamagi komilan [husjoru] omodai pajkorem»
26|57|Pas, ononro az ʙoƣho va casmaho [-i sarzamini Misr] ʙerun ovardem
26|58|Va az gancho va xonahoi mucallal [dur soxtem]
26|59|Incunin [kardem] va Bani Isroilro vorisi on [sarvatu doroi] kardem
26|60|Pas, [sipohi Fir'avn] hangomi tului oftoʙ ʙa ta'qiʙi onon pardoxtand
26|61|Va cun du guruh jakdigarro didand, joroni Muso guftand: «Hatman, [dar cangoli fir'avnijon] giriftorem»
26|62|[Muso] Guft: «Hargiz! Be tardid, Parvardigoram ʙo man ast va maro [ʙa rohi nacot] hidojat xohad kard»
26|63|Pas, ʙa Muso vahj kardem: «Asojatro ʙa darjo ʙizan», pas, [Nil] sikofta sud va har ʙaxse [az on] hamcun kuhe ʙuzurg gast
26|64|Va on guruhi digar [sipohi Fir'avn]-ro ʙa on co kasondem
26|65|Va Muso va hamai kasonero, ki hamrohas ʙudand, nacot dodem
26|66|Va digaronro ƣarq namudem
26|67|Hatman, dar in [mocaro] nisonae [ʙaroi iʙrat giriftan] ast, vale ʙestarason mu'min naʙudand
26|68|Va ʙe tardid, Parvardigorat hamon sikastnopaziri mehruʙon ast
26|69|[Ej pajomʙar] Dostoni Iʙrohimro ʙar onon ʙozgu
26|70|Hangome ki ʙa padar va qavmas guft: «Ci cizro meparasted?»
26|71|Onon guftand: «Buthoero meparastem va pajvasta sar ʙar ostonason dorem»
26|72|[Iʙrohim] Guft: «Ojo vaqte onhoro mexoned, [sadoi] sumoro mesunavand
26|73|Jo ʙa sumo sudu zijon merasonand?»
26|74|Onon guftand: «[Na] Vale padaronamonro joftem, ki cunin mekardand»
26|75|[Iʙrohim] guft: «Ojo dided [va donisted] cizhoero, ki hamvora meparastided
26|76|[ham] sumo va [ham] padaronaton –
26|77|jaqinan, [hamai] onho dusmani [aqidai tavhidii] man hastand. Magar Parvardigori cahonijon
26|78|On [ma'ʙude], ki maro ofarida va hidojatam mekunad
26|79|Va hamone, ki ʙa man ƣizo medihad va seroʙam mesozad
26|80|Va hangome ki ʙemor mesavam, Ust, ki sifojam medihad
26|81|Va kase, ki maro memironad va [duʙora] zindaam mekunad
26|82|Va kase, ki umed doram ruzi cazo gunohonamro ʙuʙaxsad
26|83|Parvardigoro, ʙa man donise [dar din] ʙuʙaxs va maro ʙa soistagon mulhaq kun
26|84|Va ʙarojam dar ojandagon ovozai nek qaror ʙideh
26|85|Va maro az vorisoni ʙihisti purne'mat ʙigardon
26|86|Va padaramro ʙijomurz, [ki] ʙe tardid, dar zumrai gumrohon ʙud
26|87|Va ruze, ki [mardum] ʙarangexta mesavand, maro rasvo [va sarmanda] nasoz
26|88|Hamon ruze, ki molu farzandon sude nameʙaxsand
26|89|Magar kase, ki ʙo qalʙi pok [va xoli az sirku nifoq va rijo] ʙa pesgohi Alloh taolo ʙijojad»
26|90|Va [on ruz] ʙihist ʙaroi parhezkoron nazdik megardad
26|91|Va duzax ʙaroi gumrohon oskor mesavad
